Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back ALL MEALS SUNSET CANAPES View gallery / Back Royal Davui Aerial View Royal Davui East Coastline Royal Davui Main Resort Pool Royal Davui Aerial View Royal Davui Island Snorkelling Fiji Royal Davui Island Resort &vert; Return flights • 7 Nights • Transfers ADULTS ONLY RESORT Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions An exclusive adults-only sanctuary situated in Fiji's spectacular Beqa Lagoon, located 35 minutes from the Pacific Harbour coast. 16 exquisitely appointed villas and bungalows nestled around 10 acres of lush tropical landscape allowing for no more than 32 guests on the island at any one time, ensuring the ultimate in privacy, personal service and relaxation. View more View less 7 nights + flights, transfers & more from $ 6979 per person share twin Flying with Fiji Airways ALL MEALS SUNSET CANAPES Enquire now Sale Period : until 10 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes Return Value class airfares flying Fiji Airways from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Nadi 5 nights accommodation at Royal Davui Island Resort 2 nights accommodation at Fiji Gateway Hotel (pre/post) Return Nadi airport transfers Return plane/launch transfer from Nadi Domestic Airport to Royal Davui Island Resort Royal Davui Island Resort Inclusions À la carte Breakfast, 3-Course Lunch & 4-Course Dinner Daily Sunset canapés each evening in the Banyan Bar Pure Fiji Bathroom Amenities Royal Davui Welcome Lei & Royal Davui Welcome Amenity on arrival FREE Wi-Fi (in public spaces) FREE use of all non-motorized water sports and activities including kayaks, catamarans, stand up paddle boards, guided island snorkelling tours & snorkelling equipment Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Island Plunge Pool Bungalow The Island Plunge Pool Bungalow is ideal for couples or honeymooners seeking a romantic getaway. Featuring a private plunge pool and breathtaking views of the surrounding ocean and lush gardens, it offers the perfect setting for a peaceful and intimate escape. Auckland 7 night package from $6979 per person share twin Additional nights from $1189 per person share twin Travel 01 Feb - 11 Feb 26, 14 Feb - 23 Feb 26, 26 Feb - 26 Mar 26 Auckland 7 night package from $7979 per person share twin Additional nights from $1395 per person share twin Travel 28 Apr - 26 Jun 26, 27 Jul - 17 Sep 26 Wellington 7 night package from $6999 per person share twin Additional nights from $1189 per person share twin Travel 02 Feb - 23 Feb 26, 14 Feb - 23 Feb 26, 26 Feb - 26 Mar 26 Wellington 7 night package from $7999 per person share twin Additional nights from $1395 per person share twin Travel 30 Apr - 25 Jun 26, 27 Jul - 17 Sep 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $7079 per person share twin Additional nights from $1189 per person share twin Travel 01 Feb - 23 Feb 26, 14 Feb - 23 Feb 26, 26 Feb - 26 Mar 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $7999 per person share twin Additional nights from $1395 per person share twin Travel 30 Apr - 25 Jun 26, 27 Jul - 28 Sep 26 Lagoon Plunge Pool Bungalow These bungalows offer spectacular views of the lagoon and reef below, with convenient access to the southern beach. Designed in a modern Pacific style, the Royal Davui bungalows feature thatched roofs, high ceilings, and your own private plunge pool for an unparalleled island experience. Terms & Conditions Sale ends 10 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 13 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return Value class flying Fiji Airways to Nadi from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch. Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • Flight departures from New Zealand are based on: from Auckland daily, from Wellington on a Monday, Thursday and Saturday and from Christchurch on a Monday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday • Travel dates specified are subject to departure days from NZ and are subject to change based on availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary • Any value adds or meal/beverage packages that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash • If adding a Meal /Beverage package it must be purchased for all adults for the full duration of your accommodation • Min/max stays apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Availability during school holiday & peak travel periods may be limited • Advertised prices are per person share twin based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. * FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options.
